thread.title: BRIEF-Fresh Del Monte Produce To Acquire Mann Packing Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fresh Del Monte Produce To Acquire Mann Packing Co

organizations.name: brief-fresh del monte produce to acquire mann packing co feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc:
* FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC. ANNOUNCES DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE MANN PACKING CO., INC.
* FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC - DEL MONTE WILL ACQUIRE MANN PACKING FOR AN AGGREGATE CONSIDERATION OF APPROXIMATELY $361 MILLION IN CASH FINANCED WITH CASH ON HAND AND COMPANYâ€˜S EXISTING CREDIT FACILITY
* FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC - DEAL FOR $361 MILLION IN CASH
* FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC - EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FIRST YEAR
* FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC - EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FIRST YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
